      void update(float time)
      update(float time) instructs the IInputManager object to update its notion of the state of all input devices about which it knows, and then to invoke any IActions associated with device components based on the IInputManager.INPUT_ACTION_TYPE of the IAction.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        void update(float time)
        update(float time) instructs the IInputManager object to update its notion of the state of all input devices about which it knows, and then to invoke any IActions associated with device components based on the IInputManager.INPUT_ACTION_TYPE of the IAction.
        Parameters:
        time - - the amount of time, normally given in milliseconds, which has passed since the last call to update().

      • associateAction

        Action associateAction(java.lang.String controllerName,
                       net.java.games.input.Component.Identifier component,
                       Action action,
                       InputManager.INPUT_ACTION_TYPE actionType)
        associateAction() causes the IInputManager object to associate an IAction (for example, "walk forward", "fire weapon", etc) with the activation of a specific component of a specific controller. Associating an IAction with a controller and component causes IInputManager#update(float) to automatically invoke that IAction, by calling its IAction#performAction(float,Event) method, based on the associated IInputManager.INPUT_ACTION_TYPE (for example, each time the specified component on the specified controller changes state).
        Parameters:
        controllerName - - the name of the controller, as returned by Controller.getName() with which the action is to be associated
        component - - identifier of the component with which the action is to be associated
        action - - the action which is to be associated with the specified component
        actionType - -- indicates when the action is to be invoked in relation to the occurrence of component events
        Returns:
        the action which was previously associated with the specified component, or null if there was no previously associated action.

      • associateAction

        Action associateAction(net.java.games.input.Controller controller,
                       net.java.games.input.Component.Identifier component,
                       Action action,
                       InputManager.INPUT_ACTION_TYPE actionType)

      • getControllers

        java.util.ArrayList<net.java.games.input.Controller> getControllers()
        getControllers() returns an ArrayList of the controllers currently recognized as attached to the execution environment. The controllers are returned in the order in which the underlying implementation (currently JInput) returns them.
        Returns:
        a list of the available device controllers

      • getKeyboardName

        java.lang.String getKeyboardName()
        Returns the name string for the Keyboard controller (if more than one keyboard is present, the first one is returned). If no keyboard controller is found, null is returned.

      • getMouseName

        java.lang.String getMouseName()
        Returns the name string for the Mouse controller (if more than one mouse is present, the first one is returned). If no mouse controller is found, null is returned.

      • getFirstGamepadName

        java.lang.String getFirstGamepadName()
        Returns the name string for the first gamepad controller. If no gamepad controller is found, null is returned.

      • getSecondGamepadName

        java.lang.String getSecondGamepadName()
        Returns the name string for the second gamepad controller (if less than two gamepad controllers are present, null is returned).

      • getControllerByName

        net.java.games.input.Controller getControllerByName(java.lang.String name)
        Returns the Controller with the specified name, or null if no controller of the specified name is installed.

      • getKeyboardController

        net.java.games.input.Controller getKeyboardController()
        Returns the Keyboard controller (if more than one keyboard is present, the first one is returned). If no keyboard controller is found, null is returned.

      • getKeyboardController

        net.java.games.input.Controller getKeyboardController(int n)
        Returns the nth occurrence of a keyboard Controller. If no keyboard controller is found, null is returned.
        Parameters:
        n - Occurrence number, such as 1 for first occurrence of a keyboard, or 2 for second occurrence of a keyboard.

      • getKeyboardControllerWithNComponents

        net.java.games.input.Controller getKeyboardControllerWithNComponents(int n)
        Returns the first keyboard controller with n or more components. If no such keyboard controller is found, null is returned.
        Parameters:
        n - The minimum number of components the keyboard should have.

      • getMouseController

        net.java.games.input.Controller getMouseController()
        Returns the Mouse controller (if more than one mouse is present, the first one is returned). If no mouse controller is found, null is returned.

      • getMouseController

        net.java.games.input.Controller getMouseController(int n)
        Returns the nth occurrence of a Mouse Controller. If no mouse controller is found, null is returned.
        Parameters:
        n - Occurrence number, such as 1 for first occurrence of a mouse, or 2 for second occurrence of a mouse.

      • getGamepadController

        net.java.games.input.Controller getGamepadController(int n)
        Returns the nth occurrence of a Gamepad Controller.
        Parameters:
        n - Occurrence number, such as 1 for first occurrence of a gamepad, or 2 for second occurrence of a gamepad.

      • getJoystickController

        Parameters:

      • printControllers

        void printControllers(boolean printComponents)
        Prints a list of all connected controllers to the console.
        Parameters:
        printComponents - TRUE if all the components of the controller should also be printed. FALSE if not.
